control.name: icbSummaryDisplayType
control.description: Sets the type of the summary function that is calculated against the current data field.

control.name: checkShowOriginalDataField
control.description: Sets whether to display raw summary values.

control.name: checkHideEmptyVariationItems
control.description: Sets whether the first (empty) column/row that displays variation data for the current data field must be hidden.

control.name: checkAllowCrossGroupVariation
control.description: Sets whether summary variations and running totals are calculated independently within individual groups or throughout the Pivot Grid.
